message: The book-of-work.json file was corrupted in commit fcdd34e (v1.57.4) and has been rebuilt. All data is now maintained in Vestige memory for better reliability and version tracking. Do not use this file - query Vestige instead.

vestige_memory.query_instructions: Use mcp__vestige__search with query: 'book-of-work prix six security audit' to retrieve current tracking data

instructions: Query Vestige memory for all book-of-work data. To add new entries: Use mcp__vestige__ingest with updated content following the schema (GUID, timestamp, status, data). This file is intentionally kept minimal as a redirect.
